item.title: A toolbox for your dotfiles
item.description: So you may have heard about this Docker™ thing. You know; it runs containers and all that jazz. You might think the container craze is only for developers that think this time they’ve finally understood operations. You’d be wrong however. I’m going to explain a simple trick that I use often when sshing into a remote machine for some old school sysadmin work. Totally lost? If the title of this post seems unintelligible, fear not!
